name: Tarot Run
description:
As everyone might know, Tarot cards are there to predict your Future.
Following that rule, in this quick rogue-like first person game named Tarot Run you roll your future gameplay containing a world, an enemy and a modifier.
So grab your crossbow and get to fighting, so your future can look bright again!

bro u gotta know how to move, i ain't gonna explain it
